ROOM FOR YOUR ENTOURAGE TO BE Themselves.

 

With the holidays on their way and Heavenly Ski Resort opening November 16, now is the perfect time to discover why Edgewood Tahoe is the #1 Resort Hotel in America. Here, you’ll experience exhilarating days and festive nights in a winter paradise—racing down snow-covered slopes, indulging in best-in-class Aprés Ski delicacies, and relaxing with loved ones at the water’s edge.
